title: Two arrested with ‘Ice’ worth nearly Rs. 50 million
body_lines: The Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested two individuals who were in possession of 4.9kg of crystal methamphetamine (‘Ice’).
They were taken into custody during a raid carried out in the area of Grandpass.
The narcotics consignment is worth nearly Rs. 50 million, according to the STF.
The suspects, aged 41 and 43 years, are reportedly residents of Mannar and Vavuniya areas.
